section.p: With the corning of night a paper lantern is lit. It gives no warmth, but you are better off here than outside. The rain is falling heavily by now. You can hear it rustling the thatch and pouring in rivulets on to the porch.
You doze off, waking in the middle of the night to see a horrific sight. Three headless corpses are lying against the far wall - the bodies of your hosts!
